name: 3-Ingredient Greek Yogurt Brownies
ingredients: ¾ cup Greek yogurt (plain, nonfat or 2%)
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and line a small baking dish (about 8x4 inches) with parchment paper
In a bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt and egg until smooth
Add cacao powder and mix until thick and smooth
Pour batter into the prepared dish and spread evenly
Sprinkle chocolate chips evenly over the top
Bake for 18–22 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out mostly clean
Cool completely before slicing into 6 brownies
